      • getModelValue

        public boolean getModelValue()
        This is a specific call only in bluetooth mode.
        This sends a command to the device to retrieve the model name.
        The model name will result asynchronous.
        Specified by:
        getModelValue in class Device
        Returns:
        true if model can be retrieved, false if not.
